Reviews.Title: Great Phone for the Money
Reviews.Author: CL
Reviews.Content: I like the phone.  It works great.  I cant figure out how to get the internet on my phone but that is the least important to me.  I have the internet at home.  I bought it because it fits T-Mobile SIMS cards and wanted a querty keyboard.  Cant beat this phone for the price.  I recommend getting a cover at the same time.

Reviews.Title: it's okay
Reviews.Author: Francis Mensah
Reviews.Content: I like  the phone ,  work perfectly well and exactly as i expected . The delivered was on time  too and recommend to anyone who is looking for a  simple phone to use

Reviews.Title: What I expected
Reviews.Author: Melissa Cable
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my daughter as her first phone.  I didn't want anything fancy, and that's exactly what this is.  She can call and text, and thats all she needs it for.  I would recommend this phone as a first-time phone for a child.  However, if you want to be able to spy on your kid, this is not the phone for you.  The texts done link into a conversation, and the storage is small, so after about 70 text messages (sent or received) it's full and you need to delete them.  The camera is not good - I got what I paid for and what I excpected to get.

Reviews.Title: don,t buy it..
Reviews.Author: k & J
Reviews.Content: want to wash your money. buy this one.  just  one week used it.  i need go to best-buy buy other phone.

Reviews.Title: You get your  money's worth,  no less no more.
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: Does what a phone should. Call, text -  and that's about it. All its missing is the snake game, and you'd have a lighter version of the throwback Nokia phone everyone used to have in 2000.

Reviews.Title: not used
Reviews.Author: gt
Reviews.Content: purchased for use in Europe but never could find a sim card for each country keyboard is small but complete

Reviews.Title: Sencillo y Económico
Reviews.Author: Rogmel A. Cubiro V
Reviews.Content: Es un teléfono que posee las funciones básicas ademas de ser compatible con internet móvil y todas las operadoras por ser cuatribanda.

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 MHz frequencies (both SIMs) plus GPRS data capabilities.
VGA Camera with a QWERTY Keyboard for Social Networks: Facebook, Twitter, MSN, Yahoo
3.5mm Audio Jack, FM Radio, MP3 Player, MP4 Player
ProductInfo.Name: BLU Q53i-VLT Samba JR Plus Quadband Phone with QWERTY Keypad, Camera, Bluetooth and Facebook - US Warranty - Violet
